Typealiases.html#/s:16NimiqClientMacOS7A.name: Address
Typealiases.html#/s:16NimiqClientMacOS7A.abstract: Can be both a hexadecimal representation or a human readable address.

Structs/SyncStatus.html#/s:16NimiqClient.name: startingBlock
Structs/SyncStatus.html#/s:16NimiqClient.abstract: The block at which the import started (will only be reset, after the sync reached his head).

Structs/Peer.html#/s:16NimiqClientMacOS4.name: headHash
Structs/Peer.html#/s:16NimiqClientMacOS4.abstract: Hash of the head block of the peer.

Structs/MempoolInfo.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: total
Structs/MempoolInfo.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Total number of pending transactions in mempool.

Structs/MempoolInfo.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: buckets
Structs/MempoolInfo.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Array containing a subset of fee per byte buckets from [10000, 5000, 2000, 1000, 500, 200, 100, 50, 20, 10, 5, 2, 1, 0] that currently have more than one transaction.

Structs/MempoolInfo.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: transactionsPerBucket
Structs/MempoolInfo.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Number of transaction in the bucket. A transaction is assigned to the highest bucket of a value lower than its fee per byte value.

Structs/WorkInstructions.html#/s:16Nimiq.name: data
Structs/WorkInstructions.html#/s:16Nimiq.abstract: Hex-encoded block header. This is what should be passed through the hash function.

Structs/WorkInstructions.html#/s:16Nimiq.name: suffix
Structs/WorkInstructions.html#/s:16Nimiq.abstract: Hex-encoded block without the header. When passing a mining result to submitBlock, append the suffix to the data string with selected nonce.

Structs/WorkInstructions.html#/s:16Nimiq.name: target
Structs/WorkInstructions.html#/s:16Nimiq.abstract: Compact form of the hash target to submit a block to this client.

Structs/WorkInstructions.html#/s:16Nimiq.name: algorithm
Structs/WorkInstructions.html#/s:16Nimiq.abstract: Field to describe the algorithm used to mine the block. Always nimiq-argon2 for now.

Structs/TransactionReceipt.html#/s:16Nim.name: transactionIndex
Structs/TransactionReceipt.html#/s:16Nim.abstract: Integer of the transactions index position in the block.

Structs/TransactionReceipt.html#/s:16Nim.name: blockHash
Structs/TransactionReceipt.html#/s:16Nim.abstract: Hex-encoded hash of the block where this transaction was in.

Structs/TransactionReceipt.html#/s:16Nim.name: blockNumber
Structs/TransactionReceipt.html#/s:16Nim.abstract: Block number where this transaction was in.

Structs/TransactionReceipt.html#/s:16Nim.name: confirmations
Structs/TransactionReceipt.html#/s:16Nim.abstract: Number of confirmations for this transaction (number of blocks on top of the block where this transaction was in).

Structs/TransactionReceipt.html#/s:16Nim.name: timestamp
Structs/TransactionReceipt.html#/s:16Nim.abstract: Timestamp of the block where this transaction was in.

Structs/BlockTemplate.html#/s:16NimiqCli.name: header
Structs/BlockTemplate.html#/s:16NimiqCli.abstract: Block template header returned by the server.

Structs/BlockTemplate.html#/s:16NimiqCli.name: body
Structs/BlockTemplate.html#/s:16NimiqCli.abstract: Block template body returned by the server.

Structs/BlockTemplate.html#/s:16NimiqCli.name: target
Structs/BlockTemplate.html#/s:16NimiqCli.abstract: Compact form of the hash target to submit a block to this client.

Structs/BlockTemplateBody.html#/s:16Nimi.name: hash
Structs/BlockTemplateBody.html#/s:16Nimi.abstract: 32-byte hex-encoded hash of the block body.

Structs/BlockTemplateBody.html#/s:16Nimi.name: extraData
Structs/BlockTemplateBody.html#/s:16Nimi.abstract: Hex-encoded value of the extra data field.

Structs/BlockTemplateBody.html#/s:16Nimi.name: transactions
Structs/BlockTemplateBody.html#/s:16Nimi.abstract: Array of hex-encoded transactions for this block.

Structs/BlockTemplateBody.html#/s:16Nimi.name: prunedAccounts
Structs/BlockTemplateBody.html#/s:16Nimi.abstract: Array of hex-encoded pruned accounts for this block.

Structs/BlockTemplateBody.html#/s:16Nimi.name: merkleHashes
Structs/BlockTemplateBody.html#/s:16Nimi.abstract: Array of hex-encoded hashes that verify the path of the miner address in the merkle tree.

Structs/BlockTemplateHeader.html#/s:16Ni.name: prevHash
Structs/BlockTemplateHeader.html#/s:16Ni.abstract: 32-byte hex-encoded hash of the previous block.

Structs/BlockTemplateHeader.html#/s:16Ni.name: accountsHash
Structs/BlockTemplateHeader.html#/s:16Ni.abstract: 32-byte hex-encoded hash of the accounts tree.

Structs/BlockTemplateHeader.html#/s:16Ni.name: nBits
Structs/BlockTemplateHeader.html#/s:16Ni.abstract: Compact form of the hash target for this block.

Structs/BlockTemplateHeader.html#/s:16Ni.name: height
Structs/BlockTemplateHeader.html#/s:16Ni.abstract: Height of the block in the block chain (also known as block number).

Structs/Block.html#/s:16NimiqClientMacOS.name: nonce
Structs/Block.html#/s:16NimiqClientMacOS.abstract: The nonce of the block used to fulfill the Proof-of-Work.

Structs/Block.html#/s:16NimiqClientMacOS.name: bodyHash
Structs/Block.html#/s:16NimiqClientMacOS.abstract: Hex-encoded 32-byte hash of the block body Merkle root.

Structs/Block.html#/s:16NimiqClientMacOS.name: accountsHash
Structs/Block.html#/s:16NimiqClientMacOS.abstract: Hex-encoded 32-byte hash of the accounts tree root.

Structs/Block.html#/s:16NimiqClientMacOS.name: difficulty
Structs/Block.html#/s:16NimiqClientMacOS.abstract: Block difficulty, encoded as decimal number in string.

Structs/Block.html#/s:16NimiqClientMacOS.name: confirmations
Structs/Block.html#/s:16NimiqClientMacOS.abstract: Number of confirmations for this transaction (number of blocks on top of the block where this transaction was in).

Structs/Block.html#/s:16NimiqClientMacOS.name: miner
Structs/Block.html#/s:16NimiqClientMacOS.abstract: Hex-encoded 20 byte address of the miner of the block.

Structs/Block.html#/s:16NimiqClientMacOS.name: minerAddress
Structs/Block.html#/s:16NimiqClientMacOS.abstract: User friendly address (NQ-address) of the miner of the block.

Structs/Block.html#/s:16NimiqClientMacOS.name: extraData
Structs/Block.html#/s:16NimiqClientMacOS.abstract: Hex-encoded value of the extra data field, maximum of 255 bytes.

Structs/Block.html#/s:16NimiqClientMacOS.name: transactions
Structs/Block.html#/s:16NimiqClientMacOS.abstract: Array of transactions. Either represented by the transaction hash or a Transaction object.

Structs/Transaction.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: blockHash
Structs/Transaction.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Hex-encoded hash of the block containing the transaction.

Structs/Transaction.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: blockNumber
Structs/Transaction.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Height of the block containing the transaction.

Structs/Transaction.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: timestamp
Structs/Transaction.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: UNIX timestamp of the block containing the transaction.

Structs/Transaction.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: confirmations
Structs/Transaction.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Number of confirmations of the block containing the transaction.

Structs/Transaction.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: transactionIndex
Structs/Transaction.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Index of the transaction in the block.

Structs/Transaction.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: fromAddress
Structs/Transaction.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Nimiq user friendly address (NQ-address) of the sending account.

Structs/Transaction.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: toAddress
Structs/Transaction.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Nimiq user friendly address (NQ-address) of the recipient account.

Structs/Transaction.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: value
Structs/Transaction.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Integer of the value (in smallest unit) sent with this transaction.

Structs/Transaction.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: fee
Structs/Transaction.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Integer of the fee (in smallest unit) for this transaction.

Structs/OutgoingTransaction.html#/s:16Ni.name: from
Structs/OutgoingTransaction.html#/s:16Ni.abstract: The address the transaction is send from.

Structs/OutgoingTransaction.html#/s:16Ni.name: fromType
Structs/OutgoingTransaction.html#/s:16Ni.abstract: The account type at the given address.

Structs/OutgoingTransaction.html#/s:16Ni.name: to
Structs/OutgoingTransaction.html#/s:16Ni.abstract: The address the transaction is directed to.

Structs/OutgoingTransaction.html#/s:16Ni.name: toType
Structs/OutgoingTransaction.html#/s:16Ni.abstract: The account type at the given address.

Structs/OutgoingTransaction.html#/s:16Ni.name: value
Structs/OutgoingTransaction.html#/s:16Ni.abstract: Integer of the value (in smallest unit) sent with this transaction.

Structs/OutgoingTransaction.html#/s:16Ni.name: fee
Structs/OutgoingTransaction.html#/s:16Ni.abstract: Integer of the fee (in smallest unit) for this transaction.

Structs/HTLC.html#/s:16NimiqClientMacOS4.name: type
Structs/HTLC.html#/s:16NimiqClientMacOS4.abstract: The account type associated with the account.

Structs/HTLC.html#/s:16NimiqClientMacOS4.name: sender
Structs/HTLC.html#/s:16NimiqClientMacOS4.abstract: Hex-encoded 20 byte address of the sender of the HTLC.

Structs/HTLC.html#/s:16NimiqClientMacOS4.name: senderAddress
Structs/HTLC.html#/s:16NimiqClientMacOS4.abstract: User friendly address (NQ-address) of the sender of the HTLC.

Structs/HTLC.html#/s:16NimiqClientMacOS4.name: recipient
Structs/HTLC.html#/s:16NimiqClientMacOS4.abstract: Hex-encoded 20 byte address of the recipient of the HTLC.

Structs/HTLC.html#/s:16NimiqClientMacOS4.name: recipientAddress
Structs/HTLC.html#/s:16NimiqClientMacOS4.abstract: User friendly address (NQ-address) of the recipient of the HTLC.

Structs/HTLC.html#/s:16NimiqClientMacOS4.name: hashCount
Structs/HTLC.html#/s:16NimiqClientMacOS4.abstract: Number of hashes this HTLC is split into.

Structs/HTLC.html#/s:16NimiqClientMacOS4.name: timeout
Structs/HTLC.html#/s:16NimiqClientMacOS4.abstract: Block after which the contract can only be used by the original sender to recover funds.

Structs/HTLC.html#/s:16NimiqClientMacOS4.name: totalAmount
Structs/HTLC.html#/s:16NimiqClientMacOS4.abstract: The total amount (in smallest unit) that was provided at the contract creation.

Structs/VestingContract.html#/s:16NimiqC.name: type
Structs/VestingContract.html#/s:16NimiqC.abstract: The account type associated with the account.

Structs/VestingContract.html#/s:16NimiqC.name: owner
Structs/VestingContract.html#/s:16NimiqC.abstract: Hex-encoded 20 byte address of the owner of the vesting contract.

Structs/VestingContract.html#/s:16NimiqC.name: ownerAddress
Structs/VestingContract.html#/s:16NimiqC.abstract: User friendly address (NQ-address) of the owner of the vesting contract.

Structs/VestingContract.html#/s:16NimiqC.name: vestingStart
Structs/VestingContract.html#/s:16NimiqC.abstract: The block that the vesting contracted commenced.

Structs/VestingContract.html#/s:16NimiqC.name: vestingStepBlocks
Structs/VestingContract.html#/s:16NimiqC.abstract: The number of blocks after which some part of the vested funds is released.

Structs/VestingContract.html#/s:16NimiqC.name: vestingStepAmount
Structs/VestingContract.html#/s:16NimiqC.abstract: The amount (in smallest unit) released every vestingStepBlocks blocks.

Structs/VestingContract.html#/s:16NimiqC.name: vestingTotalAmount
Structs/VestingContract.html#/s:16NimiqC.abstract: The total amount (in smallest unit) that was provided at the contract creation.

Structs/Account.html#/s:16NimiqClientMac.name: type
Structs/Account.html#/s:16NimiqClientMac.abstract: The account type associated with the account.

Structs/Account.html.name: Account
Structs/Account.html.abstract: Normal Nimiq account object returned by the server.

Structs/VestingContract.html.name: VestingContract
Structs/VestingContract.html.abstract: Vesting contract object returned by the server.

Structs/HTLC.html.name: HTLC
Structs/HTLC.html.abstract: Hashed Timelock Contract object returned by the server.

Structs/OutgoingTransaction.html.name: OutgoingTransaction
Structs/OutgoingTransaction.html.abstract: Used to pass the data to send transaccions.

Structs/BlockTemplateHeader.html.name: BlockTemplateHeader
Structs/BlockTemplateHeader.html.abstract: Block template header returned by the server.

Structs/BlockTemplateBody.html.name: BlockTemplateBody
Structs/BlockTemplateBody.html.abstract: Block template body returned by the server.

Structs/WorkInstructions.html.name: WorkInstructions
Structs/WorkInstructions.html.abstract: Work instructions receipt returned by the server.

Structs/Config.html.name: Config
Structs/Config.html.abstract: Used in convenience initializer in the NimiqClient class.

Enums/Error.html#/s:16NimiqClientMacOS5E.name: wrongFormat(_:)
Enums/Error.html#/s:16NimiqClientMacOS5E.abstract: Couldn’t parse the JSONRPC request to be sent.

Enums/LogLevel.html.name: LogLevel
Enums/LogLevel.html.abstract: Used to set the log level in the JSONRPC server.

Enums/PeerAddressState.html.name: PeerAddressState
Enums/PeerAddressState.html.abstract: Peer address state returned by the server.

Enums/PeerConnectionState.html.name: PeerConnectionState
Enums/PeerConnectionState.html.abstract: Peer connection state returned by the server.

Enums/PeerStateCommand.html.name: PeerStateCommand
Enums/PeerStateCommand.html.abstract: Commands to change the state of a peer.

Enums/PoolConnectionState.html.name: PoolConnectionState
Enums/PoolConnectionState.html.abstract: Pool connection state information returned by the server.

Enums/Error.html.name: Error
Enums/Error.html.abstract: Thrown when something when wrong with the JSONRPC request.

Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: id
Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Number in the sequence for the of the next request.

Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: init(config:)
Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Client initialization from a Config structure using shared URLSession.

Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: init(scheme:user:password:host:port:session:)
Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Client initialization.

Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: accounts()
Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Returns a list of addresses owned by client.

Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: blockNumber()
Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Returns the height of most recent block.

Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: consensus()
Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Returns information on the current consensus state.

Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: constant(_:value:)
Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Returns or overrides a constant value.

Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: createAccount()
Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Creates a new account and stores its private key in the client store.

Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: createRawTransaction(_:)
Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Creates and signs a transaction without sending it. The transaction can then be send via sendRawTransaction() without accidentally replaying it.

Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: getAccount(address:)
Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Returns details for the account of given address.

Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: getBalance(address:)
Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Returns the balance of the account of given address.

Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: getBlockByHash(_:fullTransactions:)
Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Returns information about a block by hash.

Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: getBlockByNumber(height:fullTransactions:)
Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Returns information about a block by block number.

Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: getBlockTemplate(address:extraData:)
Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Returns a template to build the next block for mining. This will consider pool instructions when connected to a pool.

Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: getBlockTransactionCountByHash(_:)
Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Returns the number of transactions in a block from a block matching the given block hash.

Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: getBlockTransactionCountByNumber(height:)
Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Returns the number of transactions in a block matching the given block number.

Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: getTransactionByBlockHashAndIndex(hash:index:)
Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Returns information about a transaction by block hash and transaction index position.

Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: getTransactionByBlockNumberAndIndex(height:index:)
Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Returns information about a transaction by block number and transaction index position.

Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: getTransactionByHash(_:)
Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Returns the information about a transaction requested by transaction hash.

Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: getTransactionReceipt(hash:)
Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Returns the receipt of a transaction by transaction hash.

Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: getTransactionsByAddress(_:numberOfTransactions:)
Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Returns the latest transactions successfully performed by or for an address.

Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: getWork(address:extraData:)
Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Returns instructions to mine the next block. This will consider pool instructions when connected to a pool.

Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: hashrate()
Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Returns the number of hashes per second that the node is mining with.

Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: log(tag:level:)
Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Sets the log level of the node.

Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: mempool()
Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Returns information on the current mempool situation. This will provide an overview of the number of transactions sorted into buckets based on their fee per byte (in smallest unit).

Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: mempoolContent(fullTransactions:)
Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Returns transactions that are currently in the mempool.

Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: minerAddress()
Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Returns the miner address.

Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: minerThreads(_:)
Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Returns or sets the number of CPU threads for the miner.

Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: minFeePerByte(fee:)
Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Returns or sets the minimum fee per byte.

Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: mining(state:)
Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Returns true if client is actively mining new blocks.

Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: peerCount()
Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Returns number of peers currently connected to the client.

Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: peerList()
Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Returns list of peers known to the client.

Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: peerState(address:command:)
Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Returns the state of the peer.

Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: pool(address:)
Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Returns or sets the mining pool.

Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: poolConfirmedBalance()
Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Returns the confirmed mining pool balance.

Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: poolConnectionState()
Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Returns the connection state to mining pool.

Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: sendRawTransaction(_:)
Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Sends a signed message call transaction or a contract creation, if the data field contains code.

Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: sendTransaction(_:)
Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Creates new message call transaction or a contract creation, if the data field contains code.

Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: submitBlock(_:)
Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Submits a block to the node. When the block is valid, the node will forward it to other nodes in the network.

Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: syncing()
Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Returns an object with data about the sync status or false.

Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: getRawTransactionInfo(transaction:)
Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Deserializes hex-encoded transaction and returns a transaction object.

Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.name: resetConstant(_:)
Classes/NimiqClient.html#/s:16NimiqClien.abstract: Resets the constant to default value.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
